name: Cosimi
description:
Starblessed Thralls
The cosimi are a migratory people who look towards the stars for guidance as they travel the world. They often travel unburdened by possessions and are proficient in living off the land.

options.name: Bladedancing
options.description: As part of the Cosimi culture, you have perfected the Bladedancer form. Make an Attack with a Slashing Weapon and gain a 1d4 Bonus to Dodge Checks until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Wanderer's Insight
options.description: Gain +1 Insight and you can determine the general disposition of strangers met on the road.

options.name: Star Navigator
options.description: Gain +1 Wildcraft and you cannot get lost while under the stars.
